A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was a slap in the face to fans of the original trilogy\, as well as fans of The Force Awakens. With a few rare exceptions\, this movie seemed to purposefully desecrate what fans have loved about these movies for the sake of being \"innovative.\" I didn't love The Force Awakens\, but I walked out of that movie excited about the possibilities for the rest of the trilogy. After the last Jedi\, I walked out of the  theatre with no burning questions\, no anticipation for the next installment\, and sad to know that my love for the franchise has been tainted by the travesty that this movie is.
